name: CUMTDGuide
0:
”Alexa ask c. u. m. t. d. guide when the next North Silver departs Transit Plaza”
”Alexa ask c. u. m. t. d. guide when will the next Red leave Lincoln Square Garage East”
”Alexa ask c. u. m. t. d. guide when can I expect the next East Teal to depart Illinois Terminal”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: c. u. m. t. d. guide
des:
CUMTD Guide allows the user to specify a bus and stop and have the next departure of that bus at that stop read back to them. The bus can be expressed at just the short name, Silver, or the full name, North Silver.

*Even though the bus data is provided by CUMTD, this app is not maintained or affiliated with CUMTD
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
